newsitem.title: IRAN: Iran eyes rebuilding Mozambique oil refinery.
newsitem.headline: Iran eyes rebuilding Mozambique oil refinery.

text.p: Iran is prepared to help Mozambique reconstruct its oil refinery, Tehran's ambassador to the African country said in remarks published on Saturday.
"The Islamic republic of Iran is ready to assist Mozambique in the reconstruction of its...oil refinery," Abdulali Tavakoli told the English-language Tehran Times.

Tavakoli added that the governments of Iran and Mozambique have taken preparatory measures to rebuild the refinery and that a company affiliated with the National Iranian Oil Company (NIOC) would be involved in the work.
He did not name the refinery but was apparently referring to the Matola-Lingamo refinery.
